column4: hi, im having some problems setting up my broadcom wifi card, anyone up for some assistance?
are there linux drivers for that card, or are you using ndiswrapper?
its a ive used ndiswrapper and the windows drivers for my card, it all works and it is activated. the problems begins when i try to connect using a wpa-psk key.
i've tried to follow the how-to's at ubuntu wiki but... it won't work when i try to use the wpa_supplicant.conf in terminal-mode... (i believe i've edited it correctly)
